Grand European | Trafalgar Tours | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Grand European 22 days | London roundtrip Embark on an unforgettable journey through Europe, where every moment is infused with enchantment and discovery. Begin your adventure in France, where you'll indulge in the gourmet talents that have made French cuisine world-renowned. From delicate pastries to exquisite wines, each bite is a culinary delight. Next, venture into the heart of the Black Forest, where ancient trees whisper tales of centuries past. Lose yourself in the lush greenery and tranquil beauty of this legendary landscape, immersing yourself in nature's embrace. Then, make your way to Vienna, the epitome of classical elegance. Here, you'll be treated to the irresistible allure of Sachertorte, a decadent chocolate cake that embodies the city's rich cultural heritage. Take a stroll through the cobblestone streets, where history comes alive at every turn. Throughout your journey, you'll not only experience the must-see attractions but also uncover the hidden gems that lie off the beaten path. From charming villages to picturesque landscapes, each stop offers a new perspective and a deeper connection to the beauty of Europe. Deal Details Travel Dates Various dates Mar - Oct 2024 & 2025 Priced From $10,944 per person Enquire Now Embark on an unforgettable journey through Europe, where every moment is infused with enchantment and discovery. Begin your adventure in France, where you'll indulge in the gourmet talents that have made French cuisine world-renowned. From delicate pastries to exquisite wines, each bite is a culinary delight. Next, venture into the heart of the Black Forest, where ancient trees whisper tales of centuries past. Lose yourself in the lush greenery and tranquil beauty of this legendary landscape, immersing yourself in nature's embrace. Then, make your way to Vienna, the epitome of classical elegance. Here, you'll be treated to the irresistible allure of Sachertorte, a decadent chocolate cake that embodies the city's rich cultural heritage. Take a stroll through the cobblestone streets, where history comes alive at every turn. Throughout your journey, you'll not only experience the must-see attractions but also uncover the hidden gems that lie off the beaten path. From charming villages to picturesque landscapes, each stop offers a new perspective and a deeper connection to the beauty of Europe. Inclusions An expert Travel Director and professional Driver Cherry-picked hotels, all tried and trusted All porterage and restaurant gratuities All hotel tips, charges and local taxes Breakfast daily and up to half of your evening meals Must-see sightseeing and surprise extras Audio headsets for flexible sightseeing Luxury air-conditioned coach with Wi-Fi in most countries or alternative transportation (such as rail journeys) Ferry across the Channel from Dover to Calais Optional Experiences and free time The services of a Trafalgar Local Host when you stay at Trafalgar's recommended London hotel Eurostar high-speed train from Paris to London On occasion, hotels of similar standard and location may be utilised. Itinerary Day 1 Journey to Bruges Day 2 Discover to Amsterdam's Canals Day 3 Enjoy a Scenic Cruise in the Rhineland Day 4 Admire the Black Forest then on to Lucerne Day 5 Explore Lucerne Day 6 Uncover Liechtenstein and Innsbruck Day 7 Take in Salzburg then on to Vienna Day 8 Explore Vienna's Sights Day 9 Onwards to Venice Day 10 Discover the Floating City of Venice Day 11 Journey to Assisi Day 12 Explore Pompeii's Ruins on the way to Sorrento Day 13 On to the Isle of Capri and Rome Day 14 Uncover Ancient Rome and the Vatican Museums Day 15 Off to Explore Florence Day 16 Enjoy Pisa, Monaco and the French Riviera Day 17 Discover Artistic Saint-Paul-de-Vence Day 18 Journey through Papal Avignon to Burgundy Day 19 Onwards to Paris Day 20 Explore the Sights of Paris Day 21 Catch the Eurostar to London Day 22 Journey Home Highlights Fast-track Admission to the Vatican Museums Discover Bruges, Amsterdam, Heidelberg, Lucerne, Innsbruck, Venice, Pisa, Monaco, Nice and Avignon Visit the Rhine Falls at Schaffhausen, Vaduz, a glassblowing factory in Venice, excavations in Pompeii and the Sistine Chapel in Rome, Saint-Paul-de-Vence and Beaune View the ancient sites of Rome, the Leaning Tower in Pisa, the Papal Palace and Pont d' Avignon in Avignon and Notre Dame Cathedral in Paris See the Lorelei Rock in Rhine Valley, the Benedictine Abbey of Monte Cassino and the vineyards of Burgundy Scenic Cruise through Amsterdam's canals, by private launch to St. Mark's Square in Venice, the Rhine River and to the Isle of Capri Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy or family share where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, a credit card processing fee applies. World Travellers reserve the right to correct any errors or omissions at any time. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
